author: Justine Coleman
title: Oklahoma to allow some businesses to reopen Friday
description: Oklahoma will allow some businesses to reopen starting Friday in a step toward bouying the economy, the governor announced Wednesday.Gov. Kevin Stitt (R) said during a ...
content:
Oklahoma will allow some businesses to reopen starting Friday in a step toward bouying the economy, the governor announced Wednesday.
Gov. Kevin Stitt (R) said during a press conference that hair salons, barber shops, spas, nail salons and pet groomers can b… [+2537 chars]
